Subject: Invitation to share your daily design sprint routine on Innovate & Create

Hi Lena,

I hope you’re doing well! I’m Alex Rivera, host of the “Innovate & Create” podcast where we explore the daily habits of innovators shaping tech and design.

Your work at CreativeCo, especially the way you’ve structured a daily design sprint routine, caught our attention. We think our listeners—who are passionate about technology, productivity, and creative workflows—would love to hear a “Day in the Life” episode featuring you.

Would you be interested in joining us for a relaxed conversation about how your day unfolds, the tools you rely on, and any tips you have for fostering a creative mindset?

We typically record for about 30‑45 minutes via Zoom at a time that fits your schedule. If you’re open to it, let me know a few dates/times that work for you, and I’ll gladly arrange the details.

Looking forward to the possibility of having you on the show!

Best regards,
Alex Rivera
Host, Innovate & Create
alex@innovatecreatepod.com
Here’s the personalized pitch for Lena Patel. Let me know if you’d like to send it as is, tweak any part of it, or explore the other two candidates (Jonas Weber and Dr. Maya Singh).
